document_data.name: Divine Guidance
document_data.mainbody: '''''Divine guidance''''' was an ability of [[avenger]]s to ''[[channel divinity]]'' of a [[god]] they served.
document_data.Effects: This ability allowed the avenger to to guide the attack of an ally within {{SI|50|feet|long=yes}} who was engaged in combat with a foe against whom the avenger had sworn an ''[[oath of emnity]]''. The guidance effectively allowed that ally to benefit from the increased accuracy that the avenger themself received thanks to their ''oath''.
